lines.text: Arf! This dialog is missing!
Flight Control Leader to Chip! Red alert! We have alien raiders coming in!
The convoy is under attack! Come on, Mr. Woofberg, we have to save everyone!
Arf!
Not so fast, Chip. You won’t be thwarting our plans this time! Get him, boys!
Oh no, I am a fantastic pilot, but I don’t know self-defense. Save me, Mr. Woofberg!
Arf?
Quickly, Chip. We need you, they’re all over us!
Arf!
We installed that prototype gun that fires those bouncing plasma bolts ...
Take care not to get hit by your own shots!
Arf?
Are you coming down with a cold? You sound a little off.
Oh no! Those fiends have adaptive shielding!
We’re damaging them, but until the shields are destroyed ...
they reflect our bouncy bolts!
Arf arf!
Just keep shooting them, but take care to avoid those bolts, Chip!
Those alien bastards have dropped laser barriers! ..
You’ll have to destroy the power unit to disable them.
Arf!
I swear, it sounds just like you’re barking sometimes.
By god, look at that... It’s as big as a small moon!
To be honest, Chip, I don’t see how you could possibly defeat that thing.
It’s been nice knowing you. I have a date with an escape pod. Goodbye!
GRRR.
Mr. Woofberg? Is that you? ..
You actually saved us? How?! You’re a dog!
Arf!
That’s amazing! No one is going to believe it, though.
So we’ll have to tell everyone I won us the battle.
GRRR.
Haha, good boy!
